ValidationRule.description: For a BOFE deputy, require a manager be set
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = 'BOFE_Employees' && Active__c && ISPICKVAL ( Position__c , 'Deputy' ) && ISBLANK ( Manager__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When assigning a deputy, please assign a manger in order to save the record.
